text: Hagi antahiho! Nagra navua ante'na zamagegahuanagi, knare zama esanigu anara osugahuanki, knazama esanigu navua ante'na kegahue. Hagi Juda vahe'ma Isipi mopafima nemaniza vahera, bainati kazinteti zamahe nefrisage'za, mago'a ne'zanku hu'za frigahaze. Ana hume nevu'za ana maka ome fri vagare'za omanitfa hugahaze.
